title: RIOT allows trolls :D

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
this was a conversation that i had with riot support about a weird punishment i received 
few emails deep he let me in on some top-tier info
here is him admitting that you can play norms, instalock and pretty much  troll and you won't get punished 
use this information however you want :) {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: Maybe you should play draft pick like he mentioned, it's less barbaric.
I thought about that, I like not knowing who I'm going to be against lol

This isn't new news, it's why everyone was fighting so hard for draft pick in the first place.

EDIT: He also says nothing about trolling, he just says instalocking is ok, because it's not something they want to police, and that you can't really report someone for it.

That isn't saying trolling is ok at all.

Well yeah you have a point but the ticket was because I was dealing with a troll and this player support worker said that his actions were fine so I'm guessing it's the same thing 
Ps I didn't know about it till I received the email so yeee

I mean, this part of the ticket has nothing to do with him saying it's fine, like i'll admit that trolls get away with everything, but this support ticket has 0 to do with that.

If it was still part of the ticket, what the support member is doing, is avoiding the question and giving you copy pasted responses, meaning your barely talking to anyone anyway.
Sounds like you have dealt with riot support a few times lol I asked if I was talking to a machine cause the responses seem automated xD
Well yeah you have a point but the ticket was because I was dealing with a troll and this player support worker said that his actions were fine so I'm guessing it's the same thing
